How to play ?

You have to hack a maximum of PC by clicking on the underside of the text hacking at the top of the screen towards the wifi sign and at the same time to recover the ball of green pixel with the character that is controlled with the arrows of the keyboard then to buy multiplication of Hacking, made the best score take in screenshot and pose a challenge to a friend!
